analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/37/0x72d84a0fd9ca53fa302a0a1ce4be22b1072274be.sol:
	Contract EthereumPlus has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/37/0x72d84a0fd9ca53fa302a0a1ce4be22b1072274be.sol#203-204)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_tokens' of EthereumPlus.transfer (/unique_chucks/37/0x72d84a0fd9ca53fa302a0a1ce4be22b1072274be.sol#125) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of EthereumPlus.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/37/0x72d84a0fd9ca53fa302a0a1ce4be22b1072274be.sol#205) is not in mixedCase
